content: s - stitch es decrease - together yoh - yarn over hook 3 00 hook head and body toy stuffing 8mm safety eyes using b make a magic_ring tapestry needle 1st round 7dc into magic_ring stitch marker 2nd round 2dc in each double_crochet 14dc 3rd round 1dc 2dc in next double_crochet 7 times 21dc 4th round 2dc 2dc in next double_crochet 7 times 28dc 5th to 11th round 28dc change to a 4th to 8th round 18dc 12th round 3dc 2dc in next double_crochet 7 times 35dc 9th round decrease twice 14dc 16dc 13th round 35dc 10th round decrease twice 12dc 14dc 14th round 4dc 2dc in next double_crochet 7 times 42dc 11th round decrease twice 10dc 12dc 15th round 42dc 12th round decrease twice 8dc 10dc 16th round 13dc 2dc in next double_crochet 3 times 45dc 13th round decrease twice 6dc 8dc 17th to 21st round 45dc 14th round decrease twice 4dc 6dc insert eyes between 7th and 8th rnds fasten_off do not stuff pick up all the front approximately 7 sts apart loops with a needle and pull tight to close 22nd round 7dc decrease 5 times 40dc flatten the wing with the decreases at one 23rd round 6dc decrease 5 times 35dc edge the decreased edge will be the back 24th round 5dc decrease 5 times 30dc edge of the wing 25th round 4dc decrease 5 times 25dc left wing trim 26th round 3dc decrease 5 times 20dc 27th round 2dc decrease 5 times 15dc using b attach yarn to front edge of wing with add plenty of stuffing a slip_stitch in a space between 2nd and 3rd rnds of 28th round 1dc decrease 5 times 10dc the wing and then work evenly along front 29th round decrease 5 times 5dc edge of wing as follows - * 3dc all into space fasten_off pick up all the front loops with a in front edge slip_stitch into space in front edge 4 needle and pull tight to close times * finishing with last slip_stitch in the 14th round of wing beak fasten_off and hide loose ends inside the wing using c make a magic_ring right wing trim 1st round 5dc into magic_ring 2nd round 2dc in 1st double_crochet 4dc 6dc using b attach yarn to front edge of wing in a fasten_off leave a tail for sewing space in the 14th round then work evenly along front edge of wing as given from * to * for left wings make 2 wing trim finishing with last slip_stitch between 2nd using a make a magic_ring and 3rd rnds of the wing 1st round 6dc into magic_ring fasten_off and hide loose ends inside the wing 2nd round 2dc in each double_crochet 12dc 3rd round 1dc 2dc in next double_crochet 6 times 18dc to complete sew the beak between the eyes positioning the wings at an angle pointing down towards the lower back part of the body sew the wings flat to the sides of the body with a few sts
